Key Match Events: Detroit Tigers' Kerry Carpenter is questionable for Game 5 due to a hamstring injury sustained in Game 4
Pre-Game Insights: Tigers manager A.J. Hinch stated they will wait to see Carpenter's condition before making roster decisions
Carpenter's injury could force Bligh Madris into the lineup as a potential replacement
Miscellaneous Highlights: MLB adjusted the game start time to 1:08 PM ET due to potential weather issues
The Tigers are focused on advancing to the ALCS and will make decisions based on Carpenter's recovery
Others: Kerry Carpenter's availability is critical for the Tigers' lineup in Game 5
